title: per-side offset camera bug  ( update )

replies.body:
Hey again! 

Just wanted to clarify! 

Since I started the conversation regarding this issue, I wanted to continue it by providing updates when I received them, which is why you've been seeing me replying to posts with the info I'm getting from the devs working on this issue. They've also been elbow deep working on this issue to get it fixed!

> So the correct department that has been informed of this bug but haven't got the time to tell everyone about this game breaking bug for the majority of players who play locked camera. 

Not all Rioters have a red name on the boards, so sometimes, other Rioters will relay the messages so the proper information is given out. (There have been several times where I've sought out information from the source and relayed it!)

"(There have been several times where I've sought out information from the source and relayed it!)"
Cool if you would just like to point out where all this information you have been getting from the source actually is it would be much appreciated. The only information that has been of any value that you have obtained is "This issue won't be fixed in 6.2" which even then isn't exactly great news. 

Yes i know your working on the issue but i know for a fact that if this bug affected unlocked camera, you would probably disable ranked ( tell me if im wrong ) let alone wait until patch 6.2 has finished. Now considering the majority of your players would be say around #1 bronze, #2 silver, #3 gold divisions id be a gambling man and say ALOT of them players play with there camera locked (id go as far as saying the majority of them do), im currently in plat 3 after the reset and even i play with the camera locked the majority of the time.

Im fine with the situation now, im going to wait it out. Just got abit annoyed that's all as i dont think this bug is being treated to the level of priority it should. ( in my opinion )

Oh, sure! Yes - this is information I've obtained from the devs working on the issue, as following the bug ticket as it's been updated. 

I understand the news isn't great, however, I prefer to be transparent in the sense that I would rather not say, "it's coming soon!", and would rather give you the facts, even if it's not the answer you're hoping for.

Ok Katey, do me a favour and just let us know when this bug will be patched, if and when you get the news from the devs ( for instance it will be patched in 6.3 ) if your aloud to provide that sort of information, im going to leave you be now and wait patiently.

Fingers crossed hopefully by next patch? I dont think ive ever realized just how much i relied on that offset since its been introduced. Fed a caitlyn 5 kills in lane cause i couldnt even see her or lux when they went to harass me down

Seriously, and I mean this in the nicest way possible...Shut up.

They're still working on it. They didn't say they're not working on it.


Also, the number of people using locked camera is a minority. They can't do anything about it yet, and they aren't going to stop people from playing because of it. So "everyone who was hoping to play league this patch" is a bit of an overstatement. Yes, their needs should be addressed, but them not having a fix for it yet does not mean they aren't working on it.

Seriously I've seen you on every thread about this bug moaning at people who need this bug fixed. How about you come on the bug forums to post actual bugs instead of trying to get a rise out of someone. Sorry this bug doesn't apply to you but to the people it does its game breaking. So in the nicest way possible can i kindly ask you to move on, cheers.

The severity of the bug isn't being taken into consideration therefore im expressing my disappointment in my own way.
The fact that you replied after i asked you kindly to move on and your itchy fingers cant help but get your fix on trying to get a reaction is petty. Move on WoonStruck, your opinion has been put across you have no further information.

The severity of the bug IS being taken into consideration. There's a work-around, and its a small minority that the bug affects. That, whether you like it or not, prevents it from being their highest priority. Sorry, just how it is.

The fact that you're so entitled to think that you are more important than what Riot deems is important for **their** game as a whole and think I'm trying to get a reaction from you because of that is petty. 

You yourself have no information. You only have complaints that are already, officially I might add, being addressed.

Bugfixes take time. Try to be a bit more patient. Riot doesn't have 100 people in every division. They have 2-4.

"The severity of the bug IS being taken into consideration. There's a work-around, and its a small minority that the bug affects."
And in my opinion it is not. There is no workaround at all.

"The fact that you're so entitled to think that you are more important than what Riot deems is important for the game"
Well i do play the game and i think if RIOT didn't have any players the game would be irrelevant making me JUST AS entitled to make and opinion on what is important just as much as RIOT themselves.

Im asking for more information other then "(I'm just the messenger here, so I don't have much additional info.)"
Whats wrong with wanting to know.

Now move on WoodStruck, useless and no help at all yet again.

You already know. What information would they give you? There's not much you can do until you find the source of the bug in the code, which can take a long time. The strangest things can cause bugs, sometimes in unrelated pieces of code entirely. Once they find the source of the issue, they can start fixing it. They probably won't though, after wasting a lot of time looking for it, and they'll just create an automated work-around like always, perpetuating their spaghetti code and making issues like this harder to solve without perpetuating their coding issues further.

There's a reason bugfixes take a long time for Riot. The coding is archaic for their needs, yet they still try to build on it and work with it.



> Now move on WoodStruck, useless and no help at all yet again.

You don't want help except "Hey, the bug has been fixed!"

That's not on me, that's on you. You shouldn't have created this thread if that's the mentality you're holding.

"In your opinion why?" Because the bug is game breaking just as if it was the camera being locked for instance.

"Again, you're a minority" according to what statistic? 

"You're being one of those whiny customers that just want special attention" Actually im more for equality, because if the bug was for unlocked camera i think it would be fixed as soon as possible.

Move on WoonStruck, i bet you cant. Those itchy fingers of yours cant resist.

"P.S. Nice job upvoting yourself and downvoting me. Nobody else would care enough to affect every single post." I dont know about that WoonStruck your not very popular are you mate your one post has over -20 something downvotes.

Because you do nothing but try to get a reaction on forums all day, the fact of the matter is you have nothing useful to say ever... So why dont you give it a break lad. :) cheers
Id prefer Blue side over red, the per-side allowed me to tolerate red. Is this Bug going to be hot-fixed in? yes or no?{{item:3070}}

I'm just surprised that the amount of players using per side offset lock is (allegedly) a minority. Do most people use centered exclusively? Or do beginners and advanced users alike use it as a default, but mostly leave it unlocked during action? Genuine curiosity, as it's difficult to imagine a majority relying on the centered camera.

Also, I'll quote somebody for your benefit. 

"Note there is a sorta work around where you go into semi locked then hit F9 use the middle mouse button to adjust the screen to where you want it."

That is not a fix, that does not allow you to unlock the camera but puts you in a fixed permanent locked camera which doesn't solve anything. Even per-offset camera users need to unlock the camera sometimes, in a manner that is efficient.
